entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • crashinfounix.cpp: unknown type name 'off64_t' on Alpine Linux #84665
  • [API Proposal]: Add StringMarshalling property to GeneratedComInterfaceAttribute #84662
  • Intrinsify Encoding.TryGetBytes for UTF16 -> UTF8 literals #84659
    8.0.0
  • System.Reflection.NullabilityInfoContext does not correctly determine nullability of members in constructed generics #84647
  • Reflection regression on OSX #84644
  • [wasm] Set -sMAXIMUM_MEMORY to 256 MiB by default #84638
    8.0.0
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2023-28260: .NET Remote Code Execution Vulnerability #84637
  • Store unhandled exception info on stack in Native AOT #84636
    8.0.0
  • JIT: Assertion failed '((tree->gtFlags & GTF_VAR_DEF) == 0) && (tree->GetLclNum() == lclNum) && tree->gtVNPair.BothDefined()' during 'VN based copy prop #84619
    8.0.0
  • System.ValueTuple - compatibility issue between net 4.8 and net standard 2.0 #84618
  • Some test projects fail to restore under /p:DotNetBuildFromSource=true #84617
  • ETL for Tiered Compilation Settings not showing the TieredPGO flag? #84607
  • Test failure System.Security.Cryptography.Rsa.Tests.RSAKeyFileTests.NoFuzzyPkcs8 #84601

Closed

  • SPMI replay failure for Arm64 VectorTableLookup #84536
    8.0.0
  • Assertion failed '(block->bbNext->countOfInEdges() > 0) && (block->bbJumpDest->countOfInEdges() > 0)' #84664
  • SPMI diff failure for SqlSingleTest #84631
    8.0.0
  • BinClashes for Microsoft.Interop.SourceGeneration.dll #84157
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: When stopping an IHost instance, IHostedService instances StopAsync method is called sequentially instead of asynchronously #68036
    8.0.0
  • Update the HWIntrinsic nodes to allow dead code optimization. #9626
    Future
  • Aot Analyzer shouldn't warn when passing a const string to RequiresDynamicCode applied to Types #84433
    8.0.0
  • Can't build with the new Apple SDK #84557
  • Cryptographic error "Padding is invalid and cannot be removed" after upgrading from .NET Core 3.2 to .NET 7.0.3 - hosted on IIS 10.0.17763.1 - (works on dev machine) #83381
  • Alt-Svc and Authentication header value parsers throw from TryParse #84269
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Paraller For and Paraller Foreach #84266
  • self-contained publish app crashes with missing files after update .net7.0.3 -> 7.0.4 #84346
  • SuperPMI: Improve superpmi-diffs pipeline parallelism: split asmdiffs and tpdiff #80718
    Future
  • Consolidate packaging targets to handle multi-targeting & off-by-default source generators #83532
    8.0.0
  • MulticastDelegate, BeginInvoke throws NotSupportedException #16312
    1.0.0-rtm
  • Test failures in under `ru` locale, Win10: System.Drawing.Common and other #24494
    Future
  • GeneratedRegexAttribute pattern explanation seems wrong #84537
  • Task.WhenAll(IEnumerable) causes results to disappear in specific scenario #84626
  • Why copy twice at List<T>.InsertRange in .NET Framework #84624
  • Wasm.Build.Tests.Blazor.MiscTests.DefaultTemplate_AOT_InProjectFile Test failed #84368
    8.0.0
  • TimeSpanConverter should support converting without seconds (hh:mm) #84405
  • assert in mono_marshal_ilgen_init #83804
    7.0.x
  • [mono][tests] Hybrid.WASM.Tests SIGSEGV failure on iOS #84477
    8.0.0
  • Updating lclmorph to support bitcast #71839
    8.0.0
  • [6.0] JIT.HardwareIntrinsics failure in mono llvmaot linux arm64 - "System.Exception: One or more scenarios did not complete as expected." #81907
  • EmptyHandle.MDStreamVersion always throws ArgumentNullException #72943
    8.0.0
  • Utf8Parser TryParse Numeric Parsing Wrappers Don't Inline #26742
    Future
  • Proposal: Add overloads accepting ReadOnlyMemory<char>[] to string concatenating methods #27051
    Future
  • Empty DOTNET_STARTUP_HOOKS causes error entries in Application log in Windows. #82260
    8.0.0
  • dotnet.exe prints error messages to console when launched with empty DOTNET_MULTILEVEL_LOOKUP via start process #54073
    8.0.0
  • Error 1053: The service did not respond to the start or control request in a timely fashion. #78167
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • [JIT] ARM64 - Combine 'neg' and 'cmp' to 'cmn' #84667
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Propagate TasksConfiguration when building tests #84666
    area-Infrastructure
  • Fix handling of load for msquic and search paths for nativeaot and mono #84663
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • Optimize GDV checks for objects with known type #84661
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][inline] Allow inlining methods containing ctor calls if they h… #84660
    needs-area-label
  • Simplify some importer code #84656
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix x64 macOS and Linux managed debugging #84655
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [mono][jit] Intrinsify more calls to Type:op_Equality (). #84653
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Reduce test projects and remove usage of Newtonsoft.Json in StartupHook tests #84652
    area-Host
  • Disable flaky test until find better fix #84651
    area-Extensions-Hosting
  • Implement `load_assembly_bytes` delegate for hosting API #84650
    area-Host
  • Fix for test build break in the outerloop pipeline #84649
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • SPMI: Add possibility to specify custom options in diffs pipeline #84645
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Dogfood ComInterfaceGenerator in crossgen2 #84643
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [release/7.0-staging] Fix AwaitableSocketAsyncEventArgs reorderings on weaker memory models #84641
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Sockets, 7.0.7
  • [browser][non-icu] `HybridGlobalization` not supported on WASI #84629
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • Allow promotion of structs with single float fields #84627
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use maxSIMDStructBytes when determining largest promotable struct size #84623
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser][non-icu] `HybridGlobalization` SortKey #84621
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • Avoid warnings due to RUC on type when marking assembly as library #84620
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink, 8.0.0
  • Baseline failing Pri0 tests under interop/loader #84614
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • Validate constraints on created MethodTables #84613
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'release/7.0-staging' #84611
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'release/6.0-staging' #84610
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Expose DOTNET_JitPrintInlinedMethods in Release #84606
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [JIT] ARM64 - Combine `cmp` and shift ops into a single `cmp` op #84605
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Zlib: Add some protections to the allocator used by zlib #84604
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • Zlib: Update zlib to v1.2.13, intel-zlib to v1.2.13_jtk #84602
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • [7.0-staging] Reset OOB packages from 7.0.6 #84600
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [6.0-staging] Reset OOB packages from 6.0.17 #84598
    area-Infrastructure-libraries

Merged

  • Update handling of limited register during consecutive registers allocation #84588
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • fix gtSplitTree assert #84634
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT] Fix System.Collections.Immutable.Tests #84552
    area-System.Collections, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix incorrect covariant returns tests #84615
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr
  • [Area Pod: Eirik/Krzysztof/Layomi/Tarek] Exclude issues/prs for arch- and os- labels with owners #84654
    area-Meta, 8.0.0
  • Mark tasks projects as non-source projects #84488
    area-Infrastructure
  • Add NuGet-Migrations workaround to runtime tests too #84129
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [JIT] Add support to inline the field access of primitive types marked with TLS #82973
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Merging internal commits for release/7.0 #84640
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0 #84639
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • offers to start and stop IHostedService concurrently #84048
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Hosting, community-contribution
  • Minor fixes to write barriers #75478
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Allow removal of HWIntrinsic nodes that do not have side effects #84110
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix documentation #84628
    area-System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations, community-contribution
  • Avoid producing Requires* warnings when accessing constant fields #84622
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink, 8.0.0
  • Fix build with the new MacOS SDK. (define UNW_AARCH64 aliases conditionally) #84591
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • [android][ios] Output Exported Symbols ItemGroup in LibraryBuilder #84581
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Alt-Svc and Authentication header value parsers fixes #84630
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Enable more general BITCAST folding in local morph #84144
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Delete `GT_OBJ` #84221
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Zlib: Remove unused exports #84603
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • Split superpmi-diffs pipeline runs #84521
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][eventpipe] fixup DS_EXIT_BLOCKING_PAL_SECTION in checked build #84455
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Revert "Revert "Add SIMD to LowerCallMemcmp (#84530)" (#84595)" #84599
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add internal Encoding.TryGetBytes #84609
    area-System.Text.Encoding, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Restrict tests to browser/wasi only. #84616
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • [RISC-V] Fix build fail #84608
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Add a (disabled) prototype for a generalized promotion pass #83388
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • dotnet.exe prints error messages to console when launched with empty DOTNET_MULTILEVEL_LOOKUP #84322
    area-Host, community-contribution
  • Obsolete most of the remaining legacy serialization APIs #84383
    area-System.Runtime, breaking-change, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [6.0-staging] Bump branding to 6.0.18 #84596
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure
  • [7.0-staging] Bump branding to 7.0.7 #84597
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure
  • [manual] Merge branch 'release/7.0-staging' => 'release/7.0' #84594
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow, 7.0.6
  • [manual] Merge branch 'release/6.0-staging' => 'release/6.0' #84593
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow, 6.0.17
  • add msquic to debug runtime on macOS #84181
    area-System.Net.Quic, 8.0.0
  • Revert "Add SIMD to LowerCallMemcmp" #84595
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [6.0] Reset OOB packages from 6.0.16 #84342
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries, 6.0.x
  • [7.0] Reset OOB packages from 7.0.5 #84341
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries, 7.0.x

Updated

  • Initial work to enable native events in EventPipe #84318
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] coreclr-vm and other directories in coreclr #82381
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Don't use AVX-512 for small inputs in Memmove due to throttle issues #84577
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][tasks] Extract EmitWasmBundle into generic EmitBundle task and enable bundling in mono self-contained library #84191
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Avoid allocations when adding existing items to the blob heap. #81059
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, community-contribution
  • Implement IUtf8SpanFormattable on all the numeric types in corelib #84587
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Add status code and exception info to System.Net.Http events #84036
    area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.0
  • Add support for the Aho-Corasick algorithm in regexes. #71588
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Move COM source generator APIs to System.Runtime.InteropServices.dll #84329
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation, source-generator, 8.0.0
  • Deduplicate Binary Integer parsing logic #84582
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Numerics
  • Implement proper parsing for primitives in config binding gen #84154
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • Use cinc instead of csel when possible #82031
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Enable Libraries R2R Testing in CI #83854
    area-Infrastructure
  • Support building a mono-based .NET Runtime on x64 #68424
    area-Infrastructure-mono, community-contribution
  • [mono] add internal WebWorkerEventLoop utility class #84492
    arch-wasm, area-Threading-mono
  • [tests] Stand up iOS arm runtime tests and enable tracing/eventpipe tests #79169
    area-Infrastructure-mono, runtime-mono
  • Split PortableThreadPool.WorkerThread start and loop body #84490
    area-System.Threading
  • Added the ability to specify a Spin Count Unit via a GC Configuration to release/7.0 #84495
    area-GC-coreclr, 7.0.x
  • [RISC-V] coreclr-pal and coreclr-debug directories #82380
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Build on CBL-mariner host with rootfs #84148
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Suppress clang-16 warnings (backport #81573) #84443
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • [Mono] Enable the supported V128 SIMD intrinsics on Arm64 across all codegen engines #84289
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [browser] Wasm SDK packed as a nuget package #84082
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Fix AwaitableSocketAsyncEventArgs reorderings on weaker memory models #84432
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Sockets, 6.0.18
  • [release/7.0] Suppress clang-16 warnings (backport #81573) #84444
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure, community-contribution, 7.0.7
  • [release/7.0-staging] Add linker flags to add fixup data to PDBs (#58417) #84358
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Allow ResolveReadyToRunCompilers to be run under FreeBSD #84250
    area-ReadyToRun-coreclr, community-contribution
  • DRAFT: testing/measuring cctor change #84502
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Set better DfsBlockEntry stack initial capacity #84186
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Expose setting CPU SamplingProfiler rate #83635
    area-Tracing-coreclr, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • AssemblyBuilder.Save add custom attributes handling. #84580
    area-System.Reflection, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [NativeAOT] Simplifying access to thread static variables #84566
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Start dynamic heap count work #84168
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [OSX] HybridGlobalization implement locale native functions #84417
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios, os-tvos, os-maccatalyst
  • Enable mono runtime to handle SIGTERM like CoreCLR #82806 #82813
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • [wasm-mt] Support async JS interop on threadpool threads #84494
    area-Threading-mono
  • Implement IUtf8SpanFormattable on Guid #84553
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Use Span.CopyTo(Span) in BigInteger's add and subtract #83951
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Turn Wasm exception handling on by default and use WasmEnableExceptio… #84573
    area-Build-mono
  • Populating JSON properties support #83669
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [mono][jit] Adding support for Vector128::ExtractMostSignificantBits intrinsic on ARM64 with miniJIT #84345
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [mono][aot] Enable deduplication of runtime invoke wrappers #84304
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono, os-ios, size-reduction, 8.0.0
  • [RISC-V][JIT] Fix assert on passing double in struct #84584
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [NativeAOT] Add System.Globalization.Native builds for iOS-like platforms #82393
    os-ios, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [browser][non-icu] `HybridGlobalization` indexing #84471
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • [browser] Minimal blazor.boot.json integration #84296
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Extend PreInitialization Support to readonly GC fields #84431
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix HTTP3 header decoder buffer allocation #78862
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Bump emscripten to 3.1.34 #83998
    area-Build-mono
  • Fix running tests against our DNNE'd NativeExports project to work in NativeAOT #84578
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • Try to untangle the rid calculation. #82832
    community-contribution
